  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Funciones. La función de proporcionalidad</string>
            <string language="en">Ratio and proportional division</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verhältnis und proportionale Abteilung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Taux et division proportionnelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação e divisão proporcional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto e divisione proporzionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογία και ανάλογο τμήμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de proporcionalidad directa e inversa. Se analizan ejemplos de aplicación de la regla de tres simple, directa e inversa.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach the concept of direct and inverse proportionality. It analyses examples of the simple, direct and inverse rule of three.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla de tres</string>
            <string language="en">rule of three</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporcionalidad</string>
            <string language="en">proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inversa</string>
            <string language="en">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">magnitudes proporcionales</string>
            <string language="en">proportional magnitudes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">directa</string>
            <string language="en">direct</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der direkten und umgekehrten 
Proportionatität zu unterrichten. Sie analysiert Beispiele der 
einfachen, direkten und umgekehrten Richtlinie von drei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'enseigner le concept de la proportionnalité directe et 
inverse. Elle analyse des exemples de la règle simple, directe 
et inverse de trois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar o
conceito do proportionality direto e inverso. Analisa exemplos 
da régua simples, direta e inversa de três.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
insegnare il concetto della proporzionalità diretta ed inversa. 
Analizza gli esempi della regola semplice, diretta ed inversa di
tre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει την έννοια της άμεσης και αντίστροφης 
αναλογικότητας. Αναλύει τα παραδείγματα του απλού, άμεσου 
και αντίστροφου κανόνα τριών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinie von drei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proportionatität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">proportionale Größen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">direkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règle de trois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">proportionnalité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grandeurs proportionnelles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">direct</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua de três</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inverso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">valores proporcionais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">direto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">una regola di tre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">proporzionalità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inverso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grandezze proporzionali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diretto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανόνας τριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναλογικότητα</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
